sentences.sContent: Don’t blame me – it’s not my fault.
sentences.sCn: 别来怪我——又不是我的错。

sentences.sContent: I blame his mother. She does everything for him.
sentences.sCn: 怪他母亲不好，她什么事都要为他做。

sentences.sContent: ...we are not trying to assign blame or criticize anyone or call anyone conscious...
...So who's to blame for higher childcare costs...
...Consumers of sweet foods are not really to blame because they cannot tell what food is sugary...
...Although many young people blame "Socializing" a barrier to saving money...
...No single online activity is to blame for excessive use...

phrases.pCn: 对…应负责任；应该为某事负责任

words.tran: 清白的；无可责备的；无过失的
应受责备的；该受谴责的
应受谴责的；该受责备的

trans.tranOther: to say or think that someone or something is responsible for something bad
